title: Transportation: Airport (Usefulness 9)
description: Traveler usefulness 9/10 phrases for the Airport subcategory within Transportation. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Please tell me how to get to Narita airport.
cards.romaji: Narita kuko no ikikata o oshiete kudasai.
cards.japanese: 成田空港の行き方を教えてください。
